void setModuleList (QList< Module * > *modules)
 Sets module list. Should be thread safe.
void chModList ()
 Should be called before modules list is changed outside the thread.
void stopChModList ()
 Should be called after changing of module list to unlock processing.
void timerEvent (QTimerEvent *e)
 Used to count FPS.

Detailed Description

Object of this class is used for getting frames from input and processing it with provided modules.

Works in different thread. Use chModList() and stopChModList() when changing module list.
